attributes.action: no to a new mosque in london
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please use the money on new hospital or school.  there are not any churches in the islasm countries.Let us be wise there are more people in this country who are not muslims, please listen to the silent majority, Thank you. you will one day have to answer to the Lord Jesus Christ for the decisions that you make inthis .life

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
